articles.title: Bridge-sized asteroid to come as close as 5.5mn km to Earth, reveals NASA - HT Tech
articles.description: A Near-Earth Asteroid which is bigger than the Empire State Building is predicted to pass Earth closely today, December 6. Know the asteroid’s speed, distance of approach, size, and other details, as per NASA.
articles.content: Telescopes such as NEOWISE, Atacama Large Millimeter/submillimeter Array (ALMA), Pans-STARRS1, and Catalina Sky Survey help NASA track and study asteroids that are present in space. After studying th… [+2128 chars]
